title: Our History
subtitle: The journey of Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center from its founding to becoming a trusted healthcare provider

milestones.label: Founding Year
milestones.title: Establishment of Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center
milestones.description: Founded by Dr. Rebecca Johnson with a small team of dedicated healthcare professionals, Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center opened its doors to provide comprehensive medical services to the community.

milestones.label: Expansion
milestones.title: New Specializations & Services
milestones.description: Expanded our medical services to include specialized departments for cardiology, pediatrics, and orthopedics, while also investing in advanced diagnostic equipment.

milestones.label: New Facility
milestones.title: State-of-the-Art Medical Center
milestones.description: Relocated to our current modern facility, featuring cutting-edge medical technology, comfortable patient rooms, and an expanded team of medical specialists.

milestones.label: Innovation
milestones.title: Telemedicine & Digital Health
milestones.description: Launched our comprehensive telemedicine program and patient portal, making healthcare more accessible to all members of our community, regardless of location.

milestones.label: Continuing Care
milestones.title: Leading Healthcare Provider
milestones.description: Today, Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center stands as a trusted healthcare institution serving thousands of patients annually with a team of over 25 specialists and a commitment to excellence in healthcare.
